# clampGestureAmount

**Type Property**

Don’t allow gestureAmount to go beyond +/-1.0

## Declaration

```swift
static var clampGestureAmount: NSEvent.SwipeTrackingOptions { get }
```

## Constants

- **lockDirection**: Clamp gestureAmount to 0 if the user starts to swipe in the opposite direction than they started.

items.description: Clamp gestureAmount to 0 if the user starts to swipe in the opposite direction than they started.
